Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan defeated South Africa by 33 runs in their last match, with Shadab Khan scoring 52 runs in 22 balls and Iftikhar Ahmed scoring 51 runs.
Mohammad Haris scored 28 runs in 11 balls, but Pakistan's batting remains a concern.
Pakistan's bowlers, particularly Shaheen Afridi and Shadab Khan, have been performing well.
In their previous match, Bangladesh narrowly lost to India, with Litton Das scoring 60 runs in 27 balls and Nurul Hasan scoring 25 runs in 14 balls.
Bangladesh's bowlers have been successful, but the team's batsmen have struggled.
